channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Venezuela, the Era of Escaping Consequences Is Over
item.description: In the wake of the narco-regime’s takedown, five lessons emerge — for the region, for the U.S., and for the world.

item.title: The Maduro Raid Was a Strategic Victory and a Tactical Success
item.description: Maduro’s fall presents the communist Chinese with a comprehensive embarrassment.
